Class Core2CpuInboundPort

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Core2CpuI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.TwoWayI, fr.upmc.components.ports.InboundPortI, fr.upmc.components.ports.PortI, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class Core2CpuInboundPort
extends fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractInboundPort
implements Core2CpuI
    The class Core2CpuInboundPort implements the inbound port for a component receiving requests from the core

    Description

    The port implements the Core2CpuI interface as offered.

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : feb. 2014

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Colins-Alasca
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
